info.label: Senior Developer and Devops rookie by the day, Code Ninja by the night.
info.brief: **Full-stack software developer with 7+ years of industry experience**. Currently getting my hands dirty on Devops and scalable cloud architectures using AWS.

employment.summary: 7+ years industry IT and software development experience as Fullstacker using Java. Currently I am head over heels with the idealogy of Devops and I am getting my hands dirty with the Devops in AWS space.

history.summary: I am currently embeded with a System Team for the client Capital One. I am working as a DevOps enginner and full stack Web developer.
highlights: I am currently working on a automated pipeline using jenkins 2.XXX AWS resource to confirm if a particular custom AMI (amazon machine image) is compatible enough to be used by the production environment.

I have designed and built a end to end automated testing pipeline with front end (using angular, bootstrap css3), middleware (using java 1.8) and database (using postgres) to detect environment instability. The pipeline have custom ticketing system, automatic report archival and notification system.
I along with my colleague have pioneered the strategy of using disposable virtual machine using vagrant to simulate production environment.
I have worked on website which would trigger shell sripts based jobs at remote unix box. The whole application was written in boot strap, angular js, html css3, mongodb and java 1.7
I built devops pipeline using jenkins 1.XXX, shell scripts.
I have worked extensively to create custom pipeline components using JAVA 1.8

history.summary: I was working as a Technical lead for the client Novartis Pharma. I was mostly working as a tech lead to maintain and develop lead generating marketing websites using Java/J2EE and a front end stack.
highlights: Authored private jQuery plugins to be utilized by the websites.
Authored a databse search page which used a comma seperated value file as a database. The whole searching and rendering of the webpage was authored uing core java and jsp technology.
Worked on a lot of front end Javascript librariris like mootools, jquery and their plugins.
Worked extensively on Search engine optimization
Wrote a ton of apache redirect when modules inside the websites were being deleted or moved around
Worked extensively on HTML5, AJAX and CSS3.0
Was awarded Feather in my cap from inside Wipro.

history.summary: I was working a Project engineer or rookie for the client Bank of New York Melon. I was working on Mainframe Focus to generate hughly customized reports.
highlights: Worked on a niche technology on which only 2 Indian teams were working.
Recieved multiple accolades from client and my project lead for being an expert in Mainframe Focus on a short time frame.
At one point of time I was simultaneously working on 2 teams using cystal report and mainframe focus to generate reports

history.summary: I was working as a iphone OpenGl game developer for client Ellite system.
highlights: I  have worked OpenGL ES1.1 based iPhone game for Crazee Cube (digital version of Bedlam Cube http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bedlam_cube) while working for Objectsol Technologies.
The youtube link for its add is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XifXyieukqw
The game was reviewed at London tof fair 2010 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zQCDJqYa3ls
The game was reviewed by Game Industry http://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/crazee-cube-iphone-version-of-the-dragons--den-contender--with-a-potential-world-record-to-claim

education.summary: B-Tech from West Bengal Institite of Engineering and Management
education.degree: B-Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

history.summary: Completed my Higher Secondary education from Andrews High School
Completed my Secondary education from Nava Nalanda High School

service.summary: Active US Army Reserve member and Technology for Tots technical consultant and volunteer coordinator.

testimonials.name: John Davidson
testimonials.quote: Jane is awesome! I'd hire her again in a heartbeat.

testimonials.name: Elias Fullstacker
testimonials.quote: I worked with Jane on Jabberwocky and can vouch for her awesome technical capabilities and attention to detail. Insta-hire.

testimonials.name: Dana Nevins
testimonials.quote: I've known Jane personally and professionally for almost ten years. She is one in a million.
